title: The new void creature is gonna be strong, maybe too strong
body: Yep, looking at her abilities and what they do she will most likely be a tanky top/jungle, and she will look at you and you will die gg wp

replies.body: Every new champ looks too strong lel.
she can't see for sh.it when underground though
Because she suddenly remembers she has no eyes. I wish Lee Sin would remember he's blind.

> Because she suddenly remembers she has no eyes. I wish Lee Sin would remember he's blind.

LOL, yes he should have less visibility range than all the other champs

> > Because she suddenly remembers she has no eyes. I wish Lee Sin would remember he's blind.
> 
> LOL, yes he should have less visibility range than all the other champs

Lee's trained his ears to superhuman accuracy so he hears and recognises every single sound around him and can use that to determine his exact surroundings.
Still can, but instead you see ripples everywhere.

> Still can, but instead you see ripples everywhere.

what i meant when she can't see for sh.it is she can't see much lel
forgot my gragas signature 
{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}
Yasuo with rek'sai ganks is gonna be OP as balls, the CC will be sooo strong
who's idea was it to create a champ (post 6) that can teleport to any position on the map, she is gonna be untargetable for permanent amount of time, that needs to change

Only the tunnels she dug up I think, and they are destructible with a duration too.

So she has to be there before her ulti can even work. I don't think that's where her problem lies.

It's the rage system and the samey overloaded kit Riot likes to put out for those "outplay" fans, while all they do is pretty much the same as abusing enemy's lag. "Because I can but you can't" type of bs.

EDIT: tbh I am not sure whether it's hp meter but really I hope they are destructible.

You walk over the tunnel like a Zac blob if that makes sense. 

"Currently she can have 8 tunnels on the map at any given time. Champs can destroy tunnels by standing on them, currently takes 1.5s (totally subject to change)." - Moobeat tweeted.

> Only the tunnels she dug up I think, and they are destructible with a duration too.
> 
> So she has to be there before her ulti can even work. I don't think that's where her problem lies.
> 
> It's the rage system and the samey overloaded kit Riot likes to put out for those "outplay" fans, while all they do is pretty much the same as abusing enemy's lag. "Because I can but you can't" type of bs.

True true, i guess that rito have made a mistake on this champ, her rage/fury system should be the same as gnar  (hits full - super empowered ability - can't be triggered again for a while)

Her ulti can only target the tunnels she dug up, and considering her tunnels have a duration and a hp meter so I don't think she is all that OP in terms of global presence.

On the other hand, I worry more about her kit in general, another overloaded kit no resource champ with tons of "outplay" potential, urgh.

EDIT: tbh I am not sure whether it's hp meter but really I hope they are destructible.
